name: ATMGovernance
description: This contract is used to modify Risk Settings, CRA or DataProviders for a specific ATM.

eventDecorators.name: AssetMarketSettingAdded
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: AssetMarketSettingRemoved
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: AssetMarketSettingUpdated
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: CRASet
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: DataProviderAdded
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: DataProviderRemoved
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: DataProviderUpdated
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: GeneralSettingAdded
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: GeneralSettingRemoved
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: GeneralSettingUpdated
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: SignerAdded
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: SignerRemoved
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: TLRRewardAdded
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

functionDecorators.name: addAssetMarketSetting
functionDecorators.description: Adds a new Asset Setting from a specific Market on this ATM.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: market specific asset address.

parameterDecorators.name: settingName
parameterDecorators.description: name of the setting to be added.

parameterDecorators.name: settingValue
parameterDecorators.description: value of the setting to be added.

functionDecorators.name: addDataProvider
functionDecorators.description: Adds a new Data Provider on a specific Data Type array. This function would accept duplicated data providers for the same data type.

parameterDecorators.name: dataTypeIndex
parameterDecorators.description: array index for this Data Type.

parameterDecorators.name: dataProvider
parameterDecorators.description: data provider address.

functionDecorators.name: addGeneralSetting
functionDecorators.description: Adds a new General Setting to this ATM.

parameterDecorators.name: settingName
parameterDecorators.description: name of the setting to be added.

parameterDecorators.name: settingValue
parameterDecorators.description: value of the setting to be added.

functionDecorators.name: addTLRReward
functionDecorators.description: Adds a new TLR Reward value effective immediately since current block.

functionDecorators.name: getAssetMarketSetting
functionDecorators.description: Returns an existing Asset Setting value from a specific Market on this ATM.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: market specific asset address.

parameterDecorators.name: settingName
parameterDecorators.description: name of the setting to be returned.

functionDecorators.name: getCRA
functionDecorators.description: Returns current CRA - Credit Risk Algorithm that is being used on this specific ATM. CRA is represented by a Github commit hash of the newly proposed algorithm.

functionDecorators.name: getDataProvider
functionDecorators.description: Returns a Data Provider on a specific Data Type array.

parameterDecorators.name: dataTypeIndex
parameterDecorators.description: array index for this Data Type.

parameterDecorators.name: dataProviderIndex
parameterDecorators.description: data provider index number.

functionDecorators.name: getGeneralSetting
functionDecorators.description: Returns a General Setting value from this ATM.

parameterDecorators.name: settingName
parameterDecorators.description: name of the setting to be returned.

functionDecorators.name: getTLRRewards
functionDecorators.description: Returns the complete list of rewards used on this ATM instance.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: It initializes this ATM Governance instance.

parameterDecorators.name: settingsAddress
parameterDecorators.description: the initial settings address.

parameterDecorators.name: ownerAddress
parameterDecorators.description: the owner address for this ATM Governance.

parameterDecorators.name: tlrInitialReward
parameterDecorators.description: TLR initial reward set on Liquidity mining program associated with this ATM.

functionDecorators.name: initialized
functionDecorators.description: Gets if the contract is initialized.

functionDecorators.name: removeAssetMarketSetting
functionDecorators.description: Removes an existing Asset Setting from a specific Market on this ATM.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: market specific asset address.

parameterDecorators.name: settingName
parameterDecorators.description: name of the setting to be added.

functionDecorators.name: removeDataProvider
functionDecorators.description: Removes an existing Data Provider on a specific Data Type array.

parameterDecorators.name: dataTypeIndex
parameterDecorators.description: array index for this Data Type.

parameterDecorators.name: dataProviderIndex
parameterDecorators.description: data provider index.

functionDecorators.name: removeGeneralSetting
functionDecorators.description: Removes a General Setting from this ATM.

parameterDecorators.name: settingName
parameterDecorators.description: name of the setting to be removed.

functionDecorators.name: setCRA
functionDecorators.description: Sets the CRA - Credit Risk Algorithm to be used on this specific ATM. CRA is represented by a Github commit hash of the newly proposed algorithm.

parameterDecorators.name: _cra
parameterDecorators.description: Credit Risk Algorithm github commit hash.

functionDecorators.name: settings
functionDecorators.description: The gets the settings contract address from the SETTINGS_SLOT. This address should NOT change over the time. See details in the _setSettings(...) function.

functionDecorators.name: updateAssetMarketSetting
functionDecorators.description: Updates an existing Asset Setting from a specific Market on this ATM.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: market specific asset address.

parameterDecorators.name: settingName
parameterDecorators.description: name of the setting to be added.

parameterDecorators.name: newValue
parameterDecorators.description: value of the setting to be added.

functionDecorators.name: updateDataProvider
functionDecorators.description: Updates an existing Data Provider on a specific Data Type array.

parameterDecorators.name: dataTypeIndex
parameterDecorators.description: array index for this Data Type.

parameterDecorators.name: providerIndex
parameterDecorators.description: previous data provider index.

parameterDecorators.name: newProvider
parameterDecorators.description: new data provider address.

functionDecorators.name: updateGeneralSetting
functionDecorators.description: Updates an existing General Setting on this ATM.

parameterDecorators.name: settingName
parameterDecorators.description: name of the setting to be modified.

parameterDecorators.name: newValue
parameterDecorators.description: new value to be set for this settingName.
